page.description: Converts cr-lf delimited text to JSON. First row of text is assumed to be the field names. Default delimiter (character between fields) is |. crlf - takes something like colors and turn it into a json array.
page.syntax: C result = crlf_to_json(txt as C [, delimiter as C ])

argument.name: delimiter
argument.description: Default value is "|". Delimiter that separates each field.
